name: SendCommunicationMessage
description:
Send communication messages via the Entrata Communications API.

This tool sends communication messages using the Entrata Communications API. It should be called when a user wants to send a message to a specified organization. The tool performs a POST request to the specified endpoint to deliver the message and receives a confirmation of the communication being sent.

parameters.name: client_subdomain
parameters.description: The subdomain of the client organization where the communication message will be sent.

parameters.name: communication_messages_payload
parameters.description: JSON array containing details for arPayment-related communications.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Entrata API
